fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Lend a vest to a player at night. A vest grants a player basic Defense and is absorbed upon the player being attacked (like a Witch barrier). You cannot give yourself a vest.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Blacksmith and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: The Blacksmith has lent you a vest!
